div.p: Codes describing surgical procedures. Includes codes from SNOMED CT under the hierarchy of 387713003 'Surgical procedure'. Codes from ICD-10-PCS and CPT are acceptable. CPT codes are not listed here due to intellectual property restrictions. ICD-10-PCS codes are not listed because of a limitation in the FHIR Implementation Guide publisher. For CPT and ICD-10-PCS, only codes representing surgical procedures should be included.
